adjectives.description: varietist (comparative more varietist, superlative most varietist)

entries.meaning: (obsolete) Of, relating to, or practicing sexual varietism.
examples: We would call it today an "open marriage", at once permissive and varietist
In her periodical, Woodhull stated that her proposition was to "advocate sexual freedom for all people - freedom for the monogamist to practice monogamy, for the varietist to be a varietist still.".
